thread.title: Alec Kornet special young man who died too soon: Sun Messenger: Letter to the Editor
thread.title_full: Alec Kornet special young man who died too soon: Sun Messenger: Letter to the Editor

author: Other Voices
title: Alec Kornet special young man who died too soon: Sun Messenger: Letter to the Editor
text: On Tuesday, February 14, our community lost a wonderful young man in the most startling and devastating way. Alec Kornet, a seemingly healthy, athletic, 17-year old died after having trouble breathing at hockey practice with absolutely no prior problems or...
